feedback.title: Add dark mode
feedback.description: Would love a dark theme for late-night usage.

feedback.title: Fix login button on mobile
feedback.description: The login button doesn't respond on small screens.

feedback.title: Organize feedback by category
feedback.description: It would help to browse feedback by type like UI, Bug, etc.

feedback.title: Redesign homepage layout
feedback.description: The current layout feels cluttered and hard to navigate.

feedback.title: Add real-time notifications
feedback.description: Notify users when their feedback is updated or commented on.

feedback.title: Broken links in footer
feedback.description: The About and Careers links return 404 errors.

feedback.title: Add multi-language support
feedback.description: Would be great to support other languages like Spanish and French.

feedback.title: Improve accessibility
feedback.description: Add screen reader support and proper contrast ratios.

feedback.title: Export feedback as CSV
feedback.description: Allow admins to export all feedback in CSV format.

feedback.title: Feedback timestamps are incorrect
feedback.description: Some feedback items show incorrect dates on the dashboard.

feedback.title: Allow editing submitted feedback
feedback.description: Users should be able to edit their feedback in case they want to update the details or fix typos
